author: Krishna-Vutukuri
body:
## Steps to reproduce
1. Get a Ubuntun 14.04 machine
2. Install PowerShell
3. Launch PowerShell
4. Run " get-help get-process"
## Expected behavior

Help content for get-process cmdlet
## Actual behavior

PS /home/chythu> get-help get-process
get-help : Object reference not set to an instance of an object.
At line:1 char:1
- get-help get-process
- ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  - CategoryInfo          : NotSpecified: (:) [Get-Help], NullReferenceException
  - FullyQualifiedErrorId : System.NullReferenceException,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.G
    etHelpCommand

PS /home/chythu> $error[0].exception.stacktrace
   at System.Management.Automation.Help.UpdatableHelpSystem.ShouldPromptToUpdateHelp() in /home/andrew/src/PowerShell/src/System.Management.Automation/help/UpdatableHelpSystem.cs:line 1757
   at Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.GetHelpCommand.BeginProcessing() in /home/andrew/src/PowerShell/src/System.Management.Automation/help/HelpCommands.cs:line 324
   at System.Management.Automation.Cmdlet.DoBeginProcessing() in /home/andrew/src/PowerShell/src/System.Management.Automation/engine/cmdlet.cs:line 172
   at System.Management.Automation.CommandProcessorBase.DoBegin() in /home/andrew/src/PowerShell/src/System.Management.Automation/engine/CommandProcessorBase.cs:line 514
## Environment data

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

PS /home/chythu> $psversiontable

Name                           Value

---

PSVersion                      5.1.10032.0
PSEdition                      PowerShellCore
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
BuildVersion                   3.0.0.0
GitCommitId                    v6.0.0-alpha.7
CLRVersion
WSManStackVersion              3.0
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1

comments.author: jdhitsolutions
comments.body:
I saw this as well but thought I saw something that help files hadn't been included for Linux so I didn't think much of it. But this same error also occurs on CentOS 7. And to be clear this applies to getting help for anything.

```
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      5.1.10032.0
PSEdition                      PowerShellCore
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
BuildVersion                   3.0.0.0
GitCommitId                    v6.0.0-alpha.7
CLRVersion
WSManStackVersion              3.0
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
```

title: get-help get-process throws System.NullReferenceException
